status:
status@{
        orderStatus = [
            CREATED: 'created',
            ON_VALIDATION: 'validation',
            COMPLETED: 'complete',
            CANCELLED: 'cancelled',
            CANCELLING: 'cancelling',
            CHECKED_VALID: 'valid',
            CHECKED_INVALID: 'failed',
            PAYMENT_AUTHORIZED: 'authorized',
            PAYMENT_NOT_AUTHORIZED: 'failed',
            PAYMENT_AMOUNT_RESERVED: 'reserved',
            PAYMENT_AMOUNT_NOT_RESERVED: 'notReserved',
            PAYMENT_CAPTURED: 'captured',
            PAYMENT_NOT_CAPTURED: 'notCaptured',
            FRAUD_CHECKED: 'fraudCheck',
            ORDER_PLACED_NOTIFICATION_SENT: 'placed',
            ORDER_SPLIT: 'split',
            PROCESSING_ERROR: 'failed',
            B2B_PROCESSING_ERROR: 'failed',
        ][status?.code] ?: 'other'
        return orderStatus
    }
